    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Player p1,
            Player p2)
        Build a game with two players in it
        Parameters:
        p1 - Represents Player 1. Default name is "Rara"
        p2 - Represents Player 2. Default name is "Rasputin"

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the game. Players can choose to start game or display top 10 scores If start game, players can choose to play against each other, play against the AI, or watch two AI play
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown when an invalid input is detected

      • flipCoin

        public Game.coinValue flipCoin()
        Simulates a coin flip. Used to determine turn order. Value can only be Heads or Tails
        Returns:
        enum value representing Heads or Tails

      • commands

        public void commands(Player attacker,
                     Player defender,
                     Game.gameMode gm)
        List of commands available to the player. "Attack" lets players attack. "Recharge" lets players recharge their cards. Calls the recharge() method of a card "Train" lets players gain experience at the cost of energy points
        Parameters:
        attacker - Represents attacking player
        defender - Represents defending player
        gm - Represents current game mode. Turns on AI depending on current game mode

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(Player p,
                       int i)
        Checks if a choice is valid.
        Parameters:
        p - The player conducting the choice
        i - Represent player choice
        Returns:
        Return true if valid. False otherwise

      • sameEnergy

        public boolean sameEnergy(Card a,
                          Card b)
        Checks if two cards are of the same energy type
        Parameters:
        a - Represents first card
        b - Represents second card
        Returns:
        Return true if same energy type. False otherwise

      • damageCalculator

        public void damageCalculator(Player a,
                             int attacker,
                             Player b,
                             int defender)
        Calculates the damage dealt to an opposing card. Takes into account Card type, Card Energy type and Card current status
        Parameters:
        a - Represents attacking player
        attacker - Represent Card used by attacker
        b - Represents defending player
        defender - Represent Card used by defender

      • getScoreBoard

        public void getScoreBoard(java.lang.String textFile)
                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Get the top 10 scores from "Score.txt"
        Parameters:
        textFile - Represents "Score.txt"
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Exception thrown if file is not found

      • writeToScore

        public void writeToScore(java.lang.String textFile,
                         Player newPlayer)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Write score to "Score.txt" and automatically arranges according to highest score
        Parameters:
        textFile - Represents "Score.txt"
        newPlayer - Represent player name to put in "Score.txt"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if invalid input detected
